column4: (for reference, I'm working on packaging the new fglrx drivers.)
hmmm... so they could be integrated in linux-restricted-modules ?
the spiyes means yes to my question ?
how long do you think this will take you ?
yah
I hope you'll manage :-)
not too long.  it was already packaged, but they thoughtfully rebuilt the rpms, so my dsl is just choking on the new packages now.
ok... they are quite boring :-)
and once it will be packaged... I don't know very well the package release system... But will it soon become apt-get -u dist-upgradable ?
yeah
nice :-) With any hope I'll soon be able to play tuxracer again :-)
does it work ?
yeah, it's been working during the week, but they just released a new build last night
so my connection's been choking on it
all right... With all ogra told about you, I'm sure you'll handle it :-)
it's, er, already there
hmmm... I was not speaking about release m74, but about beta version...
is it really in hoary ?
ooo2 is in hoary, yes
the beta2, really, not just the testing 74 release ?
so what is the name of the package in this case ?
I just found the testing 74 release
ah, I don't know.  if it's just testing 74 or whatever, then it hasn't been updated yet
all right, so I hope it will be updated :-)
